name: cookingTimer_setValue
description: This function is used to set the cooking time for a specific compartment of cooking equipment.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking time is being set.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking time is being set.

parameters.name: cookingTimer
parameters.description: The duration to be set as the cooking time.
